title: The autobiography and letters of Mrs. M.O.W. Oliphant /
author: Oliphant
snippet: About the ghoststory, I am turning it over in my mind, and' if I find itlikely to work out well, you shall have it in good time. The idea of the story of the Unseen called " The OpenDoor" was suggested to Mrs Oliphant by part of thegrounds belonging to Colinton House, near Edinburgh,where Mr Blackwood was then residing. WINDSOR, 20'th December...I am very glad' that Mr Langford likes "The OpenDoor," and delighted that you are satisfied with yourNew Year number.

title: The journal of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: afterwards elected member for died at Colinton House on April
